content.rendered:
Find providers for home and midrise projects 

The LEED for Homes and LEED for Midrise programs provide a network of professionals for local, on-the-ground support.  

LEED Providers have demonstrated experience supporting builders through the construction and quality assurance processes for LEED for Homes. They provide expertise and advice related to the LEED for Homes and Midrise programs and are responsible for the Green Raters – on-site inspectors for participating projects.

Contract a Provider prior to registering a project. Providers quote on a competitive basis and project owners can determine the scope of support provided. 

Explore the list of LEED for Homes and Midrise Providers. Can’t find one in your region? Contact the CAGBC for more information.
